1.text: Shampoo and condition your hair as usual, then towel dry.

2.text: Comb your hair with a wide tooth comb.

3.text: Add a styling product to your tresses.
3.vid: /3/3a/Curl Hair with Foam Rollers Step 4 Version 4.360p.mp4

4.text: Allow your hair to dry until it is only slightly damp.

5.text: Choose which size of foam rollers to use.

7.text: Divide your hair into small sections.

8.vid: /c/c6/Curl Hair with Foam Rollers Step 9 Version 3.360p.mp4

9.text: Continue adding foam rollers to the rest of your hair.

10.text: Clasp the rollers on the bottom to prevent unsightly crimps or dents.
10.vid: /1/1e/Curl Hair with Foam Rollers Step 11 Version 4.360p.mp4

11.text: Wait eight hours before removing the rollers.

12.text: Unsnap each roller and remove it.
12.vid: /d/d0/Curl Hair with Foam Rollers Step 13 Version 3.360p.mp4

13.vid: /e/e2/Curl Hair with Foam Rollers Step 14 Version 3.360p.mp4

14.text: Use hairspray to set your hair.
